abstract: Manhattan's Pierre, now owned by India's Taj Hotels, had its first Diwali party this week.
snippet: Manhattan's Pierre, now owned by India's Taj Hotels, had its first Diwali party this week.
lead_paragraph: The Pierre, the storied hotel on Manhattan's Fifth Avenue, whose guests have included Elizabeth Taylor, Audrey Hepburn and Cary Grant, held a new sort of celebration on Monday: its first-ever Diwali party.

headline.main: A Fifth Avenue Festival of Lights
